title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository with the Go CLI/server and built-in model library (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (browser & Node).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templating and shell piping utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot proxy that uses a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with both REST and gRPC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) plus docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter repo showing retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets a server chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing the ollama-js client; 80k weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package; 120k weekly downloads, supports 3.8+.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Fast C++ extension that adds HNSW vector indexing to Ollama for semantic caching.

title: ollama-model-mirror
summary: Tool to mirror Ollama's model library to a private registry (air-gapped support).
